description: '''Tamer Hosny Sherif Abbas Farghaly''' ({{langx|ar|تامر حسني شريف عباس فرغلي}}; born 16 August 1977), known by his stage name '''Tamer Hosny''' ({{langx|ar|تامر حسني}}), is an Egyptian singer and actor. He first came to public attention when he appeared on mixed tapes with other Egyptian artists. Hosny launched his solo career with his 2004 album ''Hob'', becoming a successful singer of romantic music and was given the nickname "Star of the Generation" by his fans.
